item.title: loikein's notes
item.description: Last Update Me -- -- 饭 -- -- -- Hello. I’m loikein from China. Currently I live in Bonn, Germany for my graduate study in economics. During my undergraduate study in Japan, I majored in economics and minored in computer science. I speak Chinese (native), Japanese (near native) and English (academic proficient). Feel free to point out any mistakes or compliment my aesthetic talent.
